code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{format,addDays}from'date-fns';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MealPlan(_ref){let{addFavorite}=_ref;const[mealPlan,setMealPlan]=useState([]);const[currentDate,setCurrentDate]=useState(new Date());const generateMealPlan=()=>{setMealPlan(['Meal 1','Meal 2','Meal 3']);};const handleDateChange=days=>{setCurrentDate(prevDate=>addDays(prevDate,days));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Weekly Meal Plan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:generateMealPlan,children:"Generate Meal Plan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:mealPlan.map((meal,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[meal,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addFavorite(meal),children:"Add to Favorites"})]},index))})]});}export default MealPlan;
